extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed Bitbucket Data Center and Server version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is upgrading to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the Bitbucket Data Center and Server to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which Bitbucket version is currently installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.9 to 8.9.5 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.9 to a release greater than or equal to 8.9.5.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.10 to 8.10.5 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.10 to a release greater than or equal to 8.10.5.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.11 to 8.11.4 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.11 to a release greater than or equal to 8.11.4.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.12 to 8.12.2 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.12 to a release greater than or equal to 8.12.2.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.13 to 8.13.1 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.13 to a release greater than or equal to 8.13.1.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Bitbucket 8.0-8.8 to a fixed version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Bitbucket Data Center and Server versions 8.0 to 8.8 to any of the specified fixed versions.

cve_id: Atlassian Bitbucket Data Center and Server Vulnerability
affected_products: Atlassian Bitbucket Data Center and Server 8.0.0
